comments.body: Not sure why this rename? I noticed that `ApplicativeErrorCheck` is also using the `Check` suffix. But that looks like an outlier? The vast majority have the suffix `Tests`.  There is also `MonadErrorSuite`, `BitraverseTest`, `CategoryTest`, `ComposeTest`, `ContravariantTest`, `FoldableCheck`, `ReducableCheck`, `FunctorTest`, `MonadTest`. If you leave  this one alone, I can work on another PR to consolidate them.
Will do, good point. I didn't know about `MonadErrorSuite` or the rest of the `Check`-style suites.
